        Creates a short range Attack that does not move
        Parameters:
        imageKey - The Resources image key
        x - The x-coordinate
        y - The y-coordinate
        w - The width
        h - The height
        playerAddress - The player's IP address
        damage - The damage caused
        shieldBreaker - If this shield breaks
        effect - The effect
        dir - The angle
        duration - The duration
        time - The server time of instantiation
